scripts.build: npm run compile && npm run bundle
scripts.bundle: npm run clean-wwwroot && npm run copy-wwwroot && node ./node_modules/webpack-cli/bin/cli --no-watch
scripts.bundle-watch: npm run clean-wwwroot && npm run copy-wwwroot && node ./node_modules/webpack-cli/bin/cli
scripts.compile: npm run clean-lib && npm run copy-lib && node ./node_modules/typescript/lib/tsc
scripts.compile-watch: npm run clean-lib && npm run copy-lib && node ./node_modules/typescript/lib/tsc --watch
scripts.copy-lib: npm run copy-lib:ballast-client && npm run copy-lib:css && npm run copy-lib:html
scripts.start: echo "Use the 'dotnet run' command to start the project using .NET Core" && exit 1
scripts.test: echo "Error: no test(s) configured for this project" && exit 0
